text: @businessinsider This is insane. #potato #farmers should do the right thing for people across #USA. #Donate potatoes to #food #banks, soup #kitchens, #homeless #shelters, #churches. With #COVID19 #pandemic still going on & millions without jobs, throwing, destroying food is damn wrong!
